0_map.description:
Trip itinerary

Friday: Leave San Francisco, drive to San Luis Obispo and stay with Ron and Kay Zammit.
Saturday: Hang out with Ron and Kay.
Sunday: Drive to Santa Barbara, stay with Jean-Jacques, Corinne, Jules, and Samuel Courtine.
Monday: See Santa Barbara.
Tuesday: Drive to Laguna Beach, stopping in LA to hang out.
Wednesday - Friday: Hang out in Laguna Beach and see the rest of the Orange Coast.
Saturday: Lucie and Felix take plane back, Dean drives the minivan back.
0_map.title: Map

1_zammit02.description: Ron and Kay are building a house in the hills of San Luis Obispo.
1_zammit02.title: Zammit 2

1_zammit03.description: The house has a porch that wraps around the entire second floor.  Sweet.
1_zammit03.title: Zammit 3

1_zammit04.description: Ron, Felix, Dean, and Kay on the second story porch.
1_zammit04.title: Zammit 4

1_zammit05.description: Despite Ron's fear that no baby likes a man with a beard, Felix liked him.
1_zammit05.title: Zammit 5

1_zammit06.description: The Moses family in the bowels of the future casa Zammit.  I think this is a bathroom.
1_zammit06.title: Zammit 6

1_zammit07.description: The morning view from the porch.  The property is inside a ranch; there are cows all around.  Felix absolutely loves to hear cows moo, and hear Dean moo back.
1_zammit07.title: Zammit 7

1_zammit09.description: While the house is being finished, Ron and Kay live in a huge garage shed at the bottom of the hill.  Inside the shed is parked an old camping trailer.  This is their guest quarters.
1_zammit09.title: Zammit 9

1_zammit10.description: The obligitory photo of bathing Felix in a sink.  This sink is in Ron and Kay's garage shed.
1_zammit10.title: Zammit 10

1_zammit11.description: Felix does a pole dance for Kay in downtown San Luis Obsipo.
1_zammit11.title: Zammit 11

1_zammit12.description: Kay and Felix on Avila Beach in San Luis Obsipo.
1_zammit12.title: Zammit 12

1_zammit14.description: Felix wonders where the water comes from, and where it goes to.
1_zammit14.title: Zammit 14

2_courtine1.description: Felix, Lucie, Corinne (mom), Samuel (stroller), Jules.  Just finished a satisfyingly messy Thai meal.  Thinking that three kids is probably one too many.
2_courtine1.title: Courtine 1

2_courtine2.description: Jean-Jaques with little Samuel on knee.
2_courtine2.title: Courtine 2

3_zoo1.description: Santa Barbara Zoo.  Felix and Dean agree that giraffes move funny.
3_zoo1.title: Zoo 1

4_muscle_beach.description: Muscle Beach, in Venice, LA.  Babies grow muscle mass very quickly.
4_muscle_beach.title: Muscle Beach

5_laguna1.description: Dean and Felix explore the surf at Laguna Beach.
5_laguna1.title: Laguna 1

5_laguna2.description: Felix started out scared of the surf, but by the end of the vacation grew to love it.
5_laguna2.title: Laguna 2

6_capistrano.description: Meditating at Mission San Juan Capistrano.
6_capistrano.title: Capistrano

7_getty.description: All of the Moses family agreed:  the Getty museum has a nice cactus garden (in picture), but the art sucks.
7_getty.title: Getty

8_lax.description: Lucie and Felix took the plane back because Felix was sick and tired of that minivan.
8_lax.title: Lax

9_home1.description: Back at home, where the comfort's at.
9_home1.title: Home 1

9_home2.description: Dean arrives home at night.  The next morning, BOTH front tires are found to be flat. What do we say?  Same thing we said after a messy diaper change on the back seat, and a messy spit up on the front:  thank GOD it's a rental!
9_home2.title: Home 2

description:
The Moses family went on holiday to southern California. On the trip, Felix became a pro at standing while holding on to something. He holds on with one hand and plays with toys with the other. Sometimes he forgets to hold on, and remains standing a second before he falls over.

Felix is becoming very vocal. He's always babbling. He likes to bang. His special preference is for banging any two metal things together.

This week's videos.
title: July 21
